Company Profile  
Founded by 3 directors , Credence is a leading financial services company , subsidiary of OCBC group, which excels in providing financial solutions to our valued clients. We seek to educate by providing quality financial advice to meet client's financial needs. As we are currently expanding our closely knitted family of highly motivated, vibrant and extremely fun loving achievers, we seek candidates of similar attitudes, calibre and goals to join our team which operates as a family.  
Location  
65 Chulia Street, OCBC centre 
Job Description  
Responsibilities  
•	Posting of job advertisements  
•	Manage and ensure the company's job portal is well maintained  
•	Screening and conducting interviews to shortlist potential candidates within recruitment target  
•	Handle end to end recruitment activities which includes participating in career seminars and other recruitment initiatives  
•	Assist in any other ad hoc administrative duties  
Requirements  
•	Minimum Diploma qualification from the local polytechnics / Degree holder in any field  
•	Self-motivated, target-oriented and sales focused individual  
•	No experience required as training will be provided  
•	Singaporeans/PR only  
Salary  
•	High Basic Pay with commissions
